hero.title: Our Services
hero.subtitle: Comprehensive solar solutions for homes and businesses

services.title: Residential Solar Installation
services.summary: Transform your home into a clean energy powerhouse with our custom residential solar solutions.
services.description: Our residential solar systems are designed to maximize energy production while complementing your home's aesthetics. We handle everything from initial assessment to final installation, including permits and utility connections.
features: Custom system design for your roof

services.title: Commercial Solar Solutions
services.summary: Reduce operating costs and demonstrate environmental leadership with commercial-scale solar installations.
services.description: From small businesses to large industrial facilities, we design and install solar systems that meet your energy demands and budget requirements. Take advantage of tax incentives and dramatically reduce your electricity costs.

services.title: Maintenance & Monitoring
services.summary: Keep your solar investment performing at peak efficiency with our comprehensive service plans.
services.description: Our maintenance programs include regular inspections, cleaning, and 24/7 remote monitoring to ensure your system produces maximum energy year after year.

services.title: Energy Consulting
services.summary: Expert guidance to help you navigate the solar journey and maximize your return on investment.
services.description: Our energy consultants provide comprehensive assessments, financial analysis, and strategic planning to help you make informed decisions about your energy future.

services.title: Battery Storage
services.summary: Store excess solar energy for use during peak hours or power outages with advanced battery systems.
services.description: Achieve true energy independence with our battery storage solutions. Store solar energy during the day and use it at night, during outages, or when utility rates are highest.

services.title: EV Charging Stations
services.summary: Power your electric vehicle with clean solar energy through our integrated EV charging solutions.
services.description: Complete your sustainable energy ecosystem with solar-powered EV charging. We install residential and commercial charging stations that integrate seamlessly with your solar system.

process.title: Our Installation Process
process.subtitle: From consultation to power-on, we make going solar simple

steps.title: Free Consultation
steps.description: We assess your energy needs, review your property, and discuss your goals.

steps.title: Custom Design
steps.description: Our engineers design a system optimized for your specific requirements.

steps.title: Permitting
steps.description: We handle all permits, utility paperwork, and HOA approvals.

steps.title: Installation
steps.description: Our certified technicians install your system with minimal disruption.

steps.title: Inspection
steps.description: Final inspection and utility approval to connect to the grid.

steps.title: Power On
steps.description: Your system goes live and starts generating clean energy!
